findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of tokens
findings.description: The owner can mint tokens arbitrarily through the mint function but the minted amount has an upper limit called _maxSupply.

findings.title: Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: The owner role can upgrade the contract arbitrarily without any restrictions or access control, potentially leading to unauthorized changes.

findings.title: Owner role can transfer any mistransferred BEP20 tokens to any address
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to transfer any mistakenly transferred BEP20 tokens to any desired address.
